name: Flathead
description:
Flathead is a horror game where you need to escape closed school while unknown monster is trying to kill you.

Game might have some bugs, if you find any send me  a message: https://twitter.com/MuerPan

You should have fast computer to run this game or change graphics settings (esc - setting) and set graphics settings as you want.

Note: Sometimes when you start the game first time windows defender popup show saying that file is from unknown publisher if that happens just click show more and run anyway. I am really sorry for that i have no idea how could i fix it.

Game uses animations from Mixamo.

Game uses textures from AmbientCG.

Controlls:

Keyboard: E = Open doors, windows, vents, interact with objects.                                                     Space = Jump

                   Ctrl = Crouch

                   WASD = Move

Gamepad: Left button = Open doors, windows, vents, interact with objects.

                  Bottom button = Jump

                  Right trigger = Crouch

                  Right thumbstick = Move
